data.eml:eml: Preliminary molecular phylogeny of beetle cockroaches (Diploptera) and notes on male and female genitalia (Blattodea: Blaberidae: Diplopterinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Zong-Qing (2017): Preliminary molecular phylogeny of beetle cockroaches (Diploptera) and notes on male and female genitalia (Blattodea: Blaberidae: Diplopterinae). Zootaxa 4320 (3): 523-534, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4320.3.7
